column17:
Product Description

Hair Treatment Henna is used to treat hair fall and other hair problems. Mix the Hair Treatment Henna in water and apply immediately on the hair and wait for 2-3 hours. Rinse off thoroughly with any tvam natural shampoo. It can be used once a week and the tvam Henna hair Oil and Henna Hair tonic can be used regularly on the other days to treat hair fall and promote hair growth.

column17:
Product Description

Natural Indigo is used to colour your hair without using any chemical. Use the Pure henna the first day as directed on the pack. Mix the Indigo the second day in water and apply immediately on the hair and wait for 2-3 hours. Rinse off thoroughly with any tvam natural shampoo. The Indigo colour will be effective in 48hours. Do not use any oil on the hair when applying this henna and if the hair is oily remove the oil before application.

column17:
Product Description

Mix the Henna Powder in lukewarm water and keep it aside overnight or for a minimum of 3 hours. You may use an iron container to make paste for a darker tint on your hair. For enhanced nutrition and shine mix curd or egg with henna. Divide your hair in four sections and apply the paste from root to top evenly. Give one hour time if using as conditioner but 3-4 hours if you desire to colour your hair. Rinse off thoroughly with any tvam natural shampoo.
